pullRequest.title: #2236 Different nested target mappings should generate different intermediate methods
pullRequest.bodyText:
Make sure that MappingReferences are taken into consideration when comparing whether 2 mapping methods are equal.
This makes sure that when using nested target mappings that have the same property mappings, but different mappings 2 distinct methods will be created
Fixes #2236
In 1.3.1.Final this worked by accident because the property mappings in the BeanMappingMethod were in a different order. However, we should take the mapping references that were used to construct the method when comparing whether 2 methods are equals.

commit.message:
#2236 Different nested target mappings should generate different intermediate methods

Make sure that MappingReferences are taken into consideration when comparing whether 2 mapping methods are equal.
This makes sure that when using nested target mappings that have the same property mappings, but different mappings 2 distinct methods will be created
